column1: Little Goat Diner////This is a new place in our neighborhood and I had to try it - even if there was a wait on a Sunday morning - and there was
column3: just about 30 minutes. Â I would love to go to Girl and the Goat
column4: but I can never get a reservation when I want it
column5: so I decided I will settle for Little Goat since it takes no reservations.
